info.name: Little Secret
info.description:
# Introduction
What does your API do?

# Overview
Things that the developers should know about

# Authentication
What is the preferred way of using the API?

# Error Codes
What errors and status codes can a user expect?

# Rate limit
Is there a limit to the number of requests an user can send?

request.description:
## Create user # Response # Success: {     "id": 4,     "username": "oleh",     "name": "",     "bio": "",     "picture": null,     "last_online": "2019-06-16T21:29:29.240166Z",     "status": "unknown",     "shutdown_on_screen_of": false } # Failure: # 404: {     "error": "Bad Request",     "message": "Please use a different username" } 404 Not Found

Not Found

The requested URL was not found on the server. If you entered the URL manually please check your spelling and try again.

## 500 500 Internal Server Error

Internal Server Error

The server encountered an internal error and was unable to complete your request. Either the server is overloaded or there is an error in the application.

response.name: Create user
response.body:
Internal Server Error

The server encountered an internal error and was unable to complete your request. Either the server is overloaded or there is an error in the application.

}
